headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Let it Snow
content: That time of year is here again, we know who’s been naughty and nice, and as usual the bad boys and girls get a whole sack full of homicidal treats, while the good boys and girls have to make do with an incendiary firework right between the eyes. All the usual Christmas apparel and weaponry is back in stores, as well as a special giveaway for all you proud Orbital Cannon owners. And remember, keep your eyes on the skies…
